aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Islamiyat Oniyo
aboutData.subtitle: Frontend Developer
aboutData.text: I am a Frontend Developer focused on creating visually engaging, user-friendly digital experiences. I specialize in building responsive websites and applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js, ensuring seamless performance across devices. I am passionate about clean design, attention to detail, and staying up to date with modern frontend best practices.

services.title: Frontend Web Development
services.text: I build fast, responsive websites using modern frontend technologies to deliver smooth and engaging user experiences across all devices.

services.title: WordPress Website Dev
services.text: I build and customize WordPress websites using themes, plugins, and custom code to create flexible and user-friendly solutions.

services.title: UI Implementation
services.text: I translate design concepts into clean, functional interfaces with pixel-perfect layouts and consistent, intuitive user interactions.

services.title: Responsive Design
services.text: I design layouts that adapt seamlessly across mobile, tablet, and desktop screens for a consistent user experience.

services.title: Design-to-Code Conversion
services.text: I convert Figma designs into clean, responsive code, ensuring accurate layouts, consistent styling, and smooth interactions.

services.title: Website Maintenance
services.text: I maintain and optimize websites by fixing issues, improving performance, and keeping content secure and up to date.

skillData.title: Professional Skills
skillData.text: Below are the core skills I apply in my frontend and WordPress development work. I focus on building responsive, user-focused interfaces using clean, maintainable code and modern web technologies.

skills.title: React.js – component-based architecture and state management
CSS3 & UI Styling – layouts, animations, and visual consistency
Git & GitHub – version control and collaborative workflows
Responsive Web Design – mobile-first, cross-device compatibility
Figma Design to Code – accurate UI implementation from designs

experience.title: Junior Frontend Developer
experience.subTitle: Blizzcode Academy
experience.text: Built responsive and accessible web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Collaborated on real-world projects, translated UI designs into functional components, and improved performance and usability across devices.

experience.title: Frontend Developer Intern
experience.subTitle: Iktoons Technology
experience.text: Worked as a Frontend Developer Intern, contributing to the design and development of responsive web interfaces. Gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frontend practices while collaborating with team members to build user-friendly digital solutions.

experience.title: Personal Frontend Projects
experience.subTitle: Self-Directed
experience.text: Designed and developed real-world web applications, including an e-commerce platform and an educational website. Focused on responsive design, clean UI, accessibility, and performance using modern frontend technologies.

education.title: Bachelor of Engineering in Electrical and Computer Engineering
education.subTitle: Kwara State Umiversity
education.text: Completed a Bachelor’s degree with a strong foundation in electrical systems, computer engineering principles, and problem-solving. Gained exposure to programming, algorithms, and system design, which now support my work in frontend development.

education.title: Full stack web development
education.subTitle: Udemy
education.text: Completed a comprehensive  web development course covering frontend and backfundamentals. Built projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and basic backend concepts, with a focus on real-world application development.

education.title: Responsive Web Design
education.subTitle: freeCodeCamp
education.text: Earned the freeCodeCamp Responsive Web Design certification, gaining hands-on experience with HTML5, CSS3, Flexbox, CSS Grid, accessibility, and responsive layouts through multiple real-world projects.

contactData.title: Contact Info
contactData.subTitle: Connect with me through social media or send a message directly
contactData.text: I’m always open to discussing new projects, collaborations, or opportunities. Feel free to reach out via social channels or the contact form, and I’ll get back to you promptly.
